title: Royalty free Type 1 fonts?
content:
Hi,

I am not sure if this is the right location to ask this, but feel free to move it if it isn't. I specifically need a type 1 font which can be distributed and is royalty free. Do such things exist? I know OTF and TTF have these but I seem to be coming up short with this specific type. I work on the FOP project and need to validate the CharString data from the original against that of a subset which is the feature I'm adding.

If anyone knows of any and where I can find one that would be great.

Thanks in advance
author: tronied

comments.content:
Yes. Those exists. Adobe Utopia, Bitstream Charter and Bitstream Courier 10 pitch. Google those with "type 1 xorg" added and you'll see.

Edit: There are many more if you do not need the right to modify the font file and distribute the modified font file.

If you download [MacTeX](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204132/http:/www.tug.org/mactex/) 2013 or [TeX Live](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802204132/http:/www.tug.org/texlive/) you will get 5447 font files with extension .pfb (in my installation of MacTeX, they are in /usr/local/texlive/2013/texmf-dist/fonts/type1).
